job.title: Senior PE (Multifamily Builder, $50+ MIL Annual Volume)
job.description: If you are a Senior Project Engineer looking to grow your career with a locallyfocused and growing General Contractor with an established book of business  please read onbrbrTop Reasons to Work with UsbrbrSince 2004 we have grown to become the General Contractor of choice for private and public sector clients alike We are a tightknit group with the ability to take on larger complex project but also offer the personalized experience and customized approach of a smaller firm With an annual revenue in the at 50 MIL we may not be the biggest name in the industry but our customtailored approach to each project and passion in multifamily construction specifically within the affordable housing space has made us one of the most trusted names in the greater Sacramento region for over 15 years We are currently expanding our teams with future projects in preconstruction and seeking a seniorlevel Project Manager with strong vertical construction experience within commercial and multifamily constructionbrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Write RFIs Request for Information and expedite answers for efficient responseslili Know and understand the subcontract documents as they apply to assigned areas of responsibilitylili Process Submittals and follow thru with approvalslili Have working knowledge of project scheduleslili Expedite shop drawings submittals and safety requirements for assigned tasks Utilize the Project Management system for shop drawing administration Supply required submittal information such as field dimensionslili Request and follow up on project submittals required from Subcontractors and distribute to appropriate personslili Prepare and maintain all LEED documentationlili Procure materials andor equipment as instructed by Project Managerlili Receive and distribute information on clarification and changes in the work for areas of responsibility Obtain and check subcontractors pricing and assist in assembling change order requests as directed by the Project Managerlili Assist in documenting changes maintain project records red line transfers and correspondencelili Review and respond to correspondence to and from subcontractors and vendors for assigned taskslili Prepare and distribute meeting minutes as directed by Project managerlili Be a leader in open communication with team members Promote good relations with all partiesbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli Bachelors Degree in Construction Management Engineering Architecture or related field of studylili 3 years of GClevel experience in multifamily construction preferably with demonstrated experience on projects up to 20 MIL or 100 unitslili 1year minimum field experience on ground up slabongrade podium and other multiunit residential projectslili Proficient computer skills including Microsoft Office Word Excel Outlook P6 MS Project or other CPM Scheduling Software Procore or similar project management softwarelili Knowledge of building systems construction processes and pricinglili Strong Leadership AbilitiesbrliulWhats In It for Youbrulli Competitive Base Salary Depending On Experiencelili Performance amp Companybased Bonuslili Medical Dental Vision Benefitslili 3 Weeks PTOlili 401k w matchlili Car Allowance and Gas CardbrliulSo if you are a Project Engineer with leadership experience in highdensity multifamily construction please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrPatWardCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  PW21631805  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulPat Ward  Recruiting Manager  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
